resources.string: This is a picture of Nikolai Shilder \"Temptation\". What was it significant for Tretyakov?
Before you, Vasily Surikov\'s famous painting \"The Morning of the Streltsy Execution\". In the depiction of events, the author made a historic mistake. Name it.

Once an illiterate shepherd boy in the field met a monk and complained to him that he was not given a letter. The monk took the prosphore from the chest, handed it to the boy, and offered to eat it. Having eaten the prosphora, the shepherd took possession of the letter, and the monk, having predicted his extraordinary destiny, disappeared. This meeting changed the boy\'s whole life. Who was this cowherd boy?
You gave the wrong answer.\nCorrect answer -
